title: QR Code Payment Scam

steps.text: Hi! I want to buy your item for the full asking price. I'll pay through our company's secure payment system. Just scan this QR code to confirm you received the payment. I need the item today for a gift!

choices.label: Scan the QR code to confirm payment
I only accept payment through the marketplace platform

steps.feedback: QR codes can be used to authorize payments FROM your account, not TO your account.

debrief: AUTHORITY + URGENCY: QR code scams trick sellers into thinking they're confirming receipt of payment, when they're actually authorizing a payment from their own account. The 'secure payment system' authority claim and urgency ('need today') pressure victims into acting quickly without thinking.

items.question: What's the risk of scanning unknown QR codes for payments?
options: You might pay them instead of receiving payment
